name: Timeline (itch) (Horizon CG)
description:
Description

Timeline is an indie RTS game about building, developing and expanding your Colony. It After a  war that let to the downfall of humanity, a small group of people escaped. Their ship broke down and let them stranded at an island group. 

You are their commander and your goal is to survive and build a new colony. Their are several obstacles in your way, such as raiders, which are not happy that your people have claimed the land.

In a multiplayer scenario, you go up against your friends to see who will last longer. Don't get fooled by the way in thinking they will stay friendly...

Features:

  • Classic RTS game mechanics (farming, fighting, exploring, ...)
  • Volumetric clouds + physically based atmosphere
  • Day / Night cycle
  • Procedural map generation (Forest, Meadows, Savannah) [Not available in the current test version]
  • Relaxing sound design
  • Ingame wiki
  • Multiplayer (Not available at the moment, because the UI needs a remake)
  • Raider AI

Missing:

  • Several AI enemies (only Raiders available)
  • More Assets (Buildings, people, machines, ships, ...)
  • Diplomacy
  • Actual game modes (only one mode currently called "Tutorial")
  • Savegames (Buggy at the moment)
  • More innovative Ideas

Keep in mind, the game is not nearly finished and more a testing prototype or demo version in the current state!!!
Unfortunately, I do not have the time at the moment to develop the game further, but let me know what you think of it :)
